name: DBDynamicHeightTableCell
summary: A UITableViewCell subclass assisting in autolayout based dynamic height cells for tableviews
description: A UITableViewCell subclass assisting in autolayout based dynamic height cells for tableviews. Uses recommended approach creating a prototype cell and systemLayoutSizeFittingSize to resize superview to systemLayoutSizeFittingSize all subviews of the cell's contentView with autolayout. Rather than the old method of sizeWithFont etc.
